item.title: OverTheWire: Krypton - Cryptography/Cryptanalysis
item.dc:creator: EnergyWolf
item.description:
Completed this today, very nice little wargame. I say little as it’s quite short with only 6 levels. However, I found it really hammered home the basic concepts of Cryptography/Cryptanalysis very nicely, both through the level briefs and the specific research you must do to complete levels. Wish it was longer, it feels like it ends just as it’s really getting into it’s stride. Onwards!

Read full topic
